duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide high level technical input into the design, deployment and operation of global IT Security management software and hardware devices focusing on Palo Alto XSOAR.
Work EST hours with the team - Remote.
Hit the ground running with minimal supervision.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree and 5 years of information security engineering experience. Professional and/or technical certification in Information Security is desirable (i.e. CISSP, CISM, CISA, Security+, ISO, SANS certifications).
